backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all frontend source files and configs.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML document setting meta tags, fonts, root mount point, and loading the React app.
frontend/SECURITY.md: Security guidelines recommending headers and best practices for IC deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and shared layout including header, side menu, footer, and contact buttons.
frontend/src/components/BannerCarousel.t: Autoplaying, swipe‑friendly banner carousel with navigation buttons and dot indicators.
frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx: Displays a responsive grid of category cards that navigate to matching gallery pages.
frontend/src/components/FloatingContactB: Renders fixed phone and WhatsApp action buttons using siteData contact info.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with menu button, brand title, and service location display.
frontend/src/components/icons.tsx: Exports SVG icon components including hamburger, close, phone, and WhatsApp icons.
frontend/src/components/Lightbox.tsx: Full‑screen image viewer with keyboard navigation, counters, and next/previous controls.
frontend/src/components/SideMenu.tsx: A slide-in sidebar menu that shows categories, handles close interactions, and provides a call link using site data.
frontend/src/config/siteData.ts: Defines site metadata and a list of category objects with slug, name, and image fields.
frontend/src/config/siteMedia.ts: Provides paths for banner images and category-specific gallery media assets.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context with login, logout, identity loading, and status management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend query methods are used.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeo.ts: Hook that updates document title and meta tags for SEO, Open Graph, and Twitter metadata.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, themes, utilities, and accessibility-focused base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryGalleryPage.t: Renders a category-specific image gallery with SEO metadata, redirect on invalid slug, and a lightbox for viewing images.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with SEO setup, a banner carousel, brand intro section, category grid, and feature highlights.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current build state, goals, required images, features, and known issues for the Arun Events site.
